original_solution_mapping.L1: When Trevor is 11, his older brother will be 11 x 3 = <<11*3=33>>33 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Trevor's older brother is 20 - 11 = <<20-11=9>>9 years older than Trevor.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Since Trevor is 9 years younger, Trevor will be 33 - 9 = <<33-9=24>>24 years old.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2611.
    Returns: Trevor's age when his older brother is three times as old as Trevor is now.
    """
    # L1
    trevor_current_age = 11 # Trevor is currently 11 years old
    multiplier = 3 # three times as old
    brother_target_age = trevor_current_age * multiplier

    # L2
    brother_current_age = 20 # his older brother is 20 years old
    age_difference = brother_current_age - trevor_current_age

    # L3
    trevor_future_age = brother_target_age - age_difference

    # FA
    answer = trevor_future_age
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: When Trevor is {trevor_current_age}, his older brother will be {trevor_current_age} x {multiplier} = <<{trevor_current_age}*{multiplier}={brother_target_age}>>{brother_target_age} years old.
Trevor’s older brother is {brother_current_age} - {trevor_current_age} = <<{brother_current_age}-{trevor_current_age}={age_difference}>>{age_difference} years older than Trevor.
Since Trevor is {age_difference} years younger, Trevor will be {brother_target_age} - {age_difference} = <<{brother_target_age}-{age_difference}={trevor_future_age}>>{trevor_future_age} years old.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: When Trevor is 11, his older brother will be 11 x 3 = <<11*3=33>>33 years old.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Trevor’s older brother is 20 - 11 = <<20-11=9>>9 years older than Trevor.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Since Trevor is 9 years younger, Trevor will be 11 - 9 = <<11-9=2>>2 years old.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'trevor_current_age' (value: 11) was used instead of 'brother_target_age' (value: 33).
